basics.name: TaeKyung Kwak
basics.label: AI/Data Engineer | Fullstack App Developer
basics.summary: I enjoy working with AI and coding, with particular interest in AI/Data, Flutter, and Rust. For me, development does not end at implementation — I value understanding concepts deeply and applying them to real services. I am growing as a Machine Learning Engineer and AI-driven service developer, with experience in app launches, dataset publication, VS Code extension development, hardware optimization, multi-cloud environments, and offline team collaboration.

projects.name: Cat Can Talk
projects.description: A Flutter + FastAPI based chatbot app that transforms text into 'cat-style' responses. Integrated with OpenAI GPT models and LangChain backend.
highlights: Implemented custom text transformations and dynamic chat bubble UI

projects.name: Collatz Conjecture project
projects.description: Generated and published a massive Collatz sequence dataset (~110GB raw → ~7GB Parquet compressed).
highlights: Published on Hugging Face with 500+ downloads
Optimized computation using Rust, C++, and GPU acceleration

projects.name: VS Code Sketchbook Theme
projects.description: A custom VS Code theme with Orbit fonts and unique color palettes.
highlights: Featured in Flutter Developer Community, Linkedin

projects.name: d3letters
projects.description: A Flutter application framework for building text-driven apps with a focus on customization and clean UI design.
highlights: Implemented modular design so users can easily replace or customize text content
Focused on UI consistency, typography, and theming for a polished presentation

projects.name: poe chatbot
projects.description: Two philosopher chatbots available on the Poe platform

projects.name: Blog with Flutter and SEO
highlights: Azure static web app, Firebase, Flutter, Zola
To achieve both design and SEO, I used Flutter and HTML.
Flutter, Firebase, and Azure have been connected, and details are under development.

projects.name: project plan
highlights: Program for visualizing Keras, data structures/algorithms. I plan to use Flutter, Python packages, and Matplotlib.
To achieve both design and SEO, I used Flutter and HTML.
